description:
Filecoin Orbit Nigeria is a vibrant, community-led program committed to boosting awareness and widespread adoption of the Filecoin ecosystem. Through engaging events, hands-on workshops, and targeted developer onboarding, we empower students, developers, and Nigeria's thriving tech hubs with essential skills in decentralized storage, the Filecoin Virtual Machine (FVM), and practical blockchain solutions.
Progress from November 2024, we've delivered high-impact initiatives like a dynamic Hackathon, nationwide Campus Tours, interactive University Meetups, and immersive Community Workshops connecting with thousands of students, developers, and local innovators along the way.
end_user:
The primary end users who benefit from this project are students, developers, and local tech communities. These groups are at the heart of the initiative's efforts to expand awareness and practical expertise in decentralized storage, the Filecoin Virtual Machine (FVM), and blockchain applications.
Students: Our university-focused programs have been highly impactful. The FVM Campus Tour, (FilecoinCode n' Corgi ) detailed in https://x.com/FilecoinNigeria/status/1955317031089131747, engaged over 200 students across three universities, teaching them to build decentralized applications (DApps) and deploy smart contracts on the Filecoin Virtual Machine (FVM). Additionally, university meetups (https://x.com/FilecoinNigeria/status/1911878655111725392 and https://x.com/FilecoinNigeria/status/1913514897423425738) introduced over 402 students to Filecoin and FVM, generating nearly 4,000 impressions on X, showcasing their active participation.

Developers: Hands-on workshops have empowered developers with practical skills. The Building on FVM Bootcamp 20+ participants with live demos on deploying sites and storing data on Filecoin, while the AI and Decentralized Storage Meetup and AI Agents Workshop  united 45+ developers to build AI agents powered by Filecoin, fostering technical expertise.

Local Tech Communities: Our grassroots initiatives, as seen in https://x.com/Divine_Vessel/status/1912272760564228197 and https://x.com/FilecoinNigeria/status/1911719704059670530, have strengthened local tech ecosystems through community gatherings and mentorship, exemplified by the collaborative workshop environment in https://x.com/FilecoinNigeria/status/1912294447422799977.
This setting, with participants coding and engaging with educational content like the "Smart Contracts + Possibilities" poster, highlights the inclusive community focus.
This ongoing effort continues to drive innovation and skill development within Nigeriaâ€™s tech landscape, as evidenced by our recent activities and community engagement.
filecoin_addresses_onboarded:
We've strategically onboarded key organizations like https://x.com/BorderlessDev, https://x.com/Web3Bridge, https://x.com/EthereumNigeria and many others.
In return, they've onboarded thousands of first-time Filecoin address users."
